casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Dovante GRAY-BROWN Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided April 17, 2019 Pamela S. Nagy, assistant public defender, in support of the petition. Laurie N. Feldman, special deputy assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 188 Conn. App. 446 , 204 A.3d 1161 , 2019 WL 1108384 (AC 41385) (2019), is denied.

KAHN, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
